content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the telšiai district court the court has made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant jm filed a lawsuit to terminate their marriage with the defendant vm due to the fault of both parties jm also requested the freedom to choose their surname after the divorce and for vm to pay the costs of the proceedings the court examined the evidence and concluded that the breakdown of the marriage was caused by both parties the court granted the action and ordered the dissolution of the marriage jm was granted the right to retain their premarital surname the court also decided on the division of joint property and ordered vm to pay a portion of the costs the marriage is deemed dissolved from the date of the courts decision

metadata.cost: 70.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 216.67 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
